unnormalised: Kal Hindustani stock market-an thodaso rollercoaster ride dislem! Sensex surwatik approx. 200 points sakal denvlem, sakalchea session-an, prob global cues-ak lagun, punn magir boss polem, tasa recover zalem dischea vellar. Nifty-in pan hi trend mirror keli, disachi xemeg daktto green-an sandun. Experts sangtat ki te sogle investor sentiment ani external factors-anche vishayent asat, bhai.
normalised: Kal Bharotiya share bazaracho zaato cholta cholta ubho ravlo! Sensex sokallche satrant sumar donxim ankdenni khala denvlo, sambhavatah jagtik sanketank lagun, punn magir divasachea uprant tto eka boss bhaxen portun ail'lo. Nifty-inuy teech riti dhakhoili, divasachi suruvat thodi harit bhaxen keli. Vixexagyan sangtat ki hem sogllem guantovnuk korpeanchem mon ani bhairanchem karaan, bhai.

unnormalised: Word on the street hi ki IT stocks-ak mar poddli, TCS ani Infosys donui almost 1.5% sakal asle. Dusre vatten, banking stocks je SBI ani HDFC Bank tanhi thodi resilience dakovli. Rupee-in pan thodi action dekhli, Rs. 83.20-ak trading kortale USD-ache virudh. Apparently, FIIs (Foreign Institutional Investors)-in investments kaddun vheleat, zaka lagun currency-acher pressure yetlo asa.
normalised: Khobor axea asa ki I-T stocks-ank maar podli, T-C-S ani Infosys donuy sumar ek point panch pratishatan khala denvle. Dusri kodden, S-B-I ani H-D-F-C Bank sarkhea banking stocks-ani thodi pratikar shakti dakhoili. Rupiya-ni-y thodi halchal dakhovn, U-S-D viruddha tto rupiya terasee point don shunya-cher velar zal'lo. Dishta asa ki F-I-I-s (Videshi Sansthagat Guantovnuk Korpi) guantovnuk kadun ghetat, je porakrumacher dabad dhartat.

unnormalised: Tor, hea sogleacho arth tumchea ani mazyak kiteak? Punn, tum long-term investor asat, tor ghabru naka! Hi zatam. Tumchi investments averaging out korpak vichar kar. Tum day trader asat, tor, best of luck! Hi ek bumpy ride zateli. Market updates-acher laksh divat rav, specially closing figures 3:30 PM IST-acher.
normalised: Techachem, hea soglleanchi tumcher ani mazer kitlo arth asa? Bhala, tumi lamb kallanche guantovnuk korpi asat zalear, ghabro naka! Hem sogllem ghoddtta. Tumchi guantovnuk samanya korchea vixayent vichar kara. Tumi divasache guantovnuk korpi asat zalear, bhala, tumkam subhaxea! Hem eka khoddpacho zolmogatir zavpacho asa. Bazarachea aadhunik khobrankancher dhyan deyat, vixexatah tin tis P-M I-S-T vellar band zavpeache ankdyanicher.
